DOC.brief_summary: The study 12 week treatment ( 84 day ) , parallel group , randomize , double blind , double dummy , study assess superiority indacaterol ( 150 μg o.d . ) versus formoterol ( 12 μg b.i.d . ) term trough force expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) . Patients enrol give informed consent begin screening/run-in period 14 day . Patients randomize one two treatment group use allocation ratio 1:1 receive either indacaterol ( 150 μg o.d . ) placebo formoterol , formoterol ( 12 μg b.i.d . ) placebo indacaterol treatment period 12 week .
